Everything is true?

Fuck you. History is a bundle of lies. They lie about it even when the bodies are still warm.

The poor fuckin' muslims. the peace loving (though slightly inclined towards jihad) poor bleeding hearts underdog poor bleeding heart misunderstood fucks. They were the fucking victims, right?

Well, I heard a different story. I heard that they were a side in the conflict. I heard tales of muslim terror and aggression and what-the-fuck-ever, only one fucking problem you chriristian fucks can't fucking understand is that the tongues of European and American public and politicians were/are deep inside the muslim digestive tract because of money and political power and oil. The fucking christian Bosnian cutthroats had no rich and powerful friends, so they were sacrificed - made to look like satan in the eyes of the rest of the ignant-ass world.

Fuck you fucking idiots.

The real satan is you. The dumb motherfuckers who need to divide the world into good and evil. Who need scapegoats. You righteous fucks are worse than Hitler.

The truth is that the Balkans are just a crazy fucking place, used by political powers to manipulate their ignorant fucking masses, here fools, here is satan!

Oh, the poor fucking peace loving humanist muslims. They don't really murder and abuse inobedient daughters who refuse to enter into prearranged marriages. Their society is not REALLY violent, they do not really perceive gentleness as a weekness, shit, why didn't we all listen to Muhammed from the very fucking start? He WOULD have made world piss! (I mean, peace).

Excellent post, harigata. 

Here I was thinking I wanted to download movies but what I really wanted was to hear some cynical ass 'enlighten' us all with his worldly truths.

And a clever use of the word 'fuck.' It's like I'm reading true art.
